title: Are hingeconstraints server or client sided?

posts.content_html: This is just a quick question, I never really investigated in that theme until now. If they are client then all good, but if they are server, then that’s a problem for me, would i just change the network ownership of them? Thanks for the help (basically, it’s for an obby and i need players to step on these rotating parts)

RonaldoR9:

would i just change the network ownership of them?

Exactly. A hingeconstraint is just a physics constraint that tells the engine how parts are allowed to move. It’s still the network owner who calculates the next step.
